ComicInfo.Summary:
The fourth issue of Vanguard Illustrated sports a cover by Steve Rude, signalling the finale of Mike Baron and Steve Rude's Encyclopedias story.
*Story Titles* Quark by Baron and Burchett Encyclopedias part 4 "Success" by Baron and Rude A Tangled Web by Ruth Raymond Low Level Diplomatic Immunity by Neary and Austin Student Filmmaker by Rick Geary * *
